#__TWITTER_FEED_ERROR_MISSING_SECRET: You cannot retrieve the Twitter feed as the API Secret has not been set correctly
#__TWITTER_FEED_WIDGET_DESCRIPTION: Allows for the creation of custom widgets that will display tweets posted and retweeted by a specified user.
#__TWITTER_WIDGET_INC_RETWEETS_DESCRIPTI: State if you want to display tweets retweeted by the user
#__TWITTER_WIDGET_MAX_TWEETS_DESCRIPTION: The number of tweets to be displayed. The count will still include retweets even if they are not being displayed
#__TWITTER_WIDGET_SCREEN_NAME_DESCRIPTIO: The screen name of the displayed Twitter user.
